message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate the offer, Alice, but I'm hoping to get a better price.  Would you be willing to sell it for $105?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob! I can see you're willing to pay a premium for it. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'll sell it to you for $108.
